job_title: Machine Learning Model Building (For OCR Tool)
description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

2. Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices
4. Engage in Docker container creation and deployment

7. Develop an ML model to perform OCR on Indic languages (Sanskrit, Hindi, and Marathi)
8. Occasionally work on the pipeline of OCR text correction to understand the ground scenario (converting scanned text to digital text with manual correction of OCRed text)
9. Debug and resolve issues using open communities like Stack Overflow and GitHub

IMAGE PROCESSING/MACHINE LEARNING FOR AUTOMATED EXTRACTION OF INVOICE DATA

The AI & Robotics Division of Tawi Tech Solutions is looking for an intern to develop an automated invoice processing system to process data contained in .jpeg images and, put it in a searchable and indexable format.

The problem is challenging due to non-standard invoice formats and, the presence of both handwritten and computer-typed texts.

TASKS: 

1. Pre-processing such as edge detection, bounding box calculation, high frequency and low-frequency noise elimination, de-skew, distortion elimination, glare removal, thinning, locally adaptive thresholding and so on using python, Tesseract/tesserOCR, openGL
2. Develop and implement table structure extraction algorithms
3. develop and implement machine learning algorithms using neural network implementations in Tesseract/tesserOCR
4. Post-classification processing such as incorporation of heuristics, Bayesian likelihood dictionaries and dictionaries to improve overall classification accuracy

TTS will provide a GitHub set-up.

The internship is expected to last 4-5 months.

TTS will issue a training completion certificate and write a letter of recommendation. and issue a remuneration of INR4K if the delivery meets targets agreed during the course of the internship.
